name: AP_CLAIM_IF_SVC_GRP_PXER
description: This table contains the service line Grouper Procedure Ambulatory Payment Classification (APC) Error value returned from the third party interface.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim info record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: SVC_GRP_PX_ERR
columns.description: The service line Procedure Ambulatory Payment Classification (APC) Error field from the APC Grouper output fields.
